name: Portal Dungeon
description:
In “Portal Dungeon”, in this multiplayer Roguelite adventure game with random elements, as an adventurer, you and your friends will bravely find the last portal in this portal world, defeat powerful enemies and save the world.


There are more than a dozen controllable characters in the game, and each has 4 skills, and each skill can evolve into 3 variants! You can personalize each character until you find the one that suits you best!


As a Side-Scrolling Roguelite game, "Portal Dungeon" currently has eight levels in total, and each level has completely different maps, monsters and bosses. When you encounter strange enemies with very different styles, how will you take countermeasures to face them?


There are hundreds of items in the game, and there is no limit to the number of picked items, so don't worry about the risk of picking up the same item! You can mix and match these props at will, and cooperate with the character talent to form your own best gameplay!


It supports up to 4-player connection, and it is more fun to play with friends.
